thread.section_title: Heard on the Street - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Chips Are Far From Down at Samsung

author: Jacky Wong
title: The Chips Are Far From Down at Samsung
text:
The Samsung Electronics winning streak may not last forever—but its low valuation and more generous dividend ought to support the stock.
The Korean technology giant, the world’s largest chipmaker, reported a record operating profit for the fourth quarter in a row for the three months ended March. Memory chips were again the driver. Operating profits for the semiconductor segment, mostly memory chips, were up 83% from a year earlier.
...
